General_Description: '''Bridging the Gap''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''How much wood does it take to get to the other side? Head east to the coast of the [[Cursed Land of Oedipous]]. Where a [[Bridge to Euboea|bridge]] is being built to [[Euboea]], I will be waiting at the last plank.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
